ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup sugar frosted corn flake cereal

cookingTips: Melt butterscotch chips and peanut butter over low heat to prevent burning
Stir in cereal gently to avoid crushing the flakes
Drop spoonfuls quickly onto parchment before mixture hardens
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on managing melting temperatures and working quickly with the mixture before it sets.
